issue.title: [JS] Implement JSON writer for Integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-987](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-987). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rather than storing generated binary files in the repo, we could just run the integration tests on the JS implementation.
